about.description2: With over 25 years of experience, we've established ourselves as a trusted partner for clients seeking quality, innovation, and reliability.

overview.title: Company Overview
overview.description: BuildHolding is a leading construction company with over 25 years of experience in delivering high-quality projects across Bulgaria and Eastern Europe. We specialize in commercial, residential, and industrial construction with a focus on sustainability and innovation.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.integrityDesc: We conduct business with honesty, transparency and ethical practices in all our dealings.
values.qualityDesc: We are committed to excellence and the highest standards in every project we undertake.
values.innovationDesc: We continuously seek new technologies and methods to improve our construction processes.
values.sustainabilityDesc: We build with the future in mind, minimizing environmental impact and maximizing efficiency.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: At BuildHolding, our mission is to create innovative, sustainable structures that stand the test of time. We believe in combining cutting-edge technology with traditional craftsmanship to deliver exceptional value to our clients and communities.

who.title: Who We Are
who.content: Founded in 1995, BuildHolding has grown from a small local contractor to one of the region's most respected construction firms. Our team of 200+ professionals brings expertise across residential, commercial, and industrial projects.

team.title: Our Team
team.content: Our diverse team includes architects, engineers, project managers, and skilled tradespeople. Led by our founder and CEO, Ivan Petrov, we foster a culture of excellence, innovation, and continuous learning.

equipment.title: Equipment
equipment.content: BuildHolding owns and maintains a comprehensive fleet of modern construction equipment, from heavy machinery to specialized tools. This allows us to control quality, timelines, and costs across all our projects.

quality.title: Quality Standards
quality.content: We adhere to ISO 9001 quality management standards and employ rigorous quality control processes throughout each project. Our commitment to excellence has earned us multiple industry certifications and awards.

timeline.title: Timeline
timeline.content: Over our 30-year history, BuildHolding has completed more than 500 projects valued at over â‚¬1.5 billion. From our humble beginnings to our current position as an industry leader, our growth reflects our commitment to excellence.

founding.title: Company Founded
founding.description: Started as a small residential contractor in Sofia

commercial.title: Expansion to Commercial
commercial.description: Began taking on commercial construction projects

holding.title: Holding Formation
holding.description: Reorganized as BuildHolding with multiple subsidiaries

partners.title: Partners
partners.content: We maintain strategic partnerships with leading material suppliers, technology providers, and specialized subcontractors. These collaborations allow us to offer integrated solutions and stay at the forefront of industry innovations.

clients.title: Clients
clients.content: Our client portfolio spans government agencies, multinational corporations, developers, and private investors. We are proud that over 75% of our business comes from repeat clients and referrals - a testament to our commitment to client satisfaction.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with our team

form.title: Send us a Message
form.name: Name
form.subject: Subject
form.successMessage: Thank you for contacting us. We'll get back to you as soon as possible.

footer.description: Excellence in construction since 1995. Building the future with integrity, innovation, and quality craftsmanship.
